gamestart.name: Ship Gallery
gamestart.description: A single sector where you can try out all ships in SWLU with infinite credits. Because this is also used for testing, you won't be able to access the universe.

gamestart.name: Rebel Smuggler
gamestart.description: You start carrying valuable (and illegal) blasters aboard your trusty YT-2400 Light Freighter. These will be worth a great deal of credits to the right buyers.

gamestart.name: Rebel Recruit
gamestart.description: Having just joined the Rebel Alliance, you have been issued an X-Wing fighter with an experimental booster system for testing.

gamestart.name: Jedi Survivor
gamestart.description: Due to being undercover in Separatist space, you have survived Order 66. With nothing left and lots of enemies, you must find new allies if you are to survive.

gamestart.name: Damyath Import
gamestart.description: Import a previously exported Litcube's Universe game.

gamestart.name: Techno Union Holdout
gamestart.description: Having been almost entirely wiped out by the empire, you regained your footing and continue to fight off the empire, for the Confederacy!

gamestart.name: Banking Clan Remnants
gamestart.description: After escaping to the unknown regions due to the persuing empire, the remnants of the Banking clan continue to stave off xenon attacks.

gamestart.name: Rebel Squadron
gamestart.description: Lead a squadron of rebel fighters to aid the rebel fleet at Endor.

gamestart.name: Old Republic Enthusiast
gamestart.description: You find great joy in collecting and restoring ancient ship designs. You have heard rumors of a legendary ship spotted drifting in the far-reaches of the universe, and simply must have it for your collection.

gamestart.name: Reborn Sith
gamestart.description: You have been hidden away for thousands of years in your temple before being revived by the dark-side of the force. With your still-functioning ship, you set out to dominate the universe.

gamestart.name: Black Sun Outlaw
gamestart.description: [UNSTABLE] After being nearly destroyed by the efforts of all major galactic governments, your recent theft of a high-value medical transport has given the Black Sun organization hope to rebuild and recover.

gamestart.name: Galaxy's Most Wanted
gamestart.description: With the collapse of the Zann Consortium after being defeated at the hands of both the Rebels and the Empire, the entire galaxy is out to finish you off. You must find a way to rebuild or make peace with the galaxy.

gamestart.name: CSA Prospector
gamestart.description: With the Galactic Civil War still engulfing the galaxy, you escape to the Corporate sector to find a safe place for business.

gamestart.name: Deluded Scoundrel
gamestart.description: You gambled everything away and stole a ship to finally get your hands on a legendary treasure map you have been seeking your whole life.

gamestart.name: Imperial Convoy
gamestart.description: Your light convoy is tasked with delivering vital kyber crystals for the Empire's 'Project Stardust'. See to it that your cargo reaches an Imperial mining outpost.

gamestart.name: Empire's Finest
gamestart.description: As an Imperial ace pilot, you have been chosen to test the new TIE Defender, the result of Grand Admiral Thrawn's New Fighter Initiative. This ship, combined with your skills, will be a force to be reckoned with.

gamestart.name: CSA Administrator
gamestart.description: Your vast fortune from your political career will let you enter any area of investment without obstacle. Establish monopolies, build a fleet, and dominate the economy.

gamestart.name: Rattatak Scrapper
gamestart.description: After years of yearning to travel the stars, you have finally peiced-together a wrecked ship from your outer-rim planet and taken to space.

gamestart.name: Mandalorian Outcast
gamestart.description: Cast out as a member of House Vizsla, you must prove your worth in battle to be welcomed back. Take your scrappy ship and reclaim the title of Mandalorian Warrior through combat and glory.

gamestart.name: Mandalorian Arms Dealer
gamestart.description: You own and operate factories producing Mandalorian weapons, the finest in the galaxy. With the ongoing wars, there is ample opportunity to expand your business.

gamestart.name: Bothan Spy
gamestart.description: Having served in the empire as a pilot, you work hard to maintain good relations despite your ultimate loyalty to the Rebel Alliance. When the day comes, they will never know what hit them.

gamestart.name: Work in Progress
gamestart.description: Not yet implemented. No peeking!

ship.comment: B-Wing Advanced - Special version with no ware lists

gamestart.name: Bravo Flight
gamestart.description: You are the leader of Bravo flight, a squadron of naboo starfighters. You must chose which side to ally with for the current conflict to decide the fate of Naboo.

gamestart.name: ExGal Outpost Manager
gamestart.description: You have set up and work to maintain an ExGal-4 outpost at the edge of the galaxy to research extragalctic species.

gamestart.name: Traitorous Delinquent
gamestart.description: Lucky for you, your parents were politicians living in the Core. Using their money you bought a ship. While they get evicted, you set off with your ship to join galactic affairs.

gamestart.name: Imperial Border Control
gamestart.description: After rising rapidly through imperial ranks, you are given a modestly large ship and some escorts to assist Imperial forces in defending the border to the core worlds.

gamestart.name: Reborn Rakkatan
gamestart.description: With your entire species gone extinct due to being cut off from the force, you are your species sole survivor, and it is your responsibility to avenge your fallen kin.

gamestart.name: Stranded
gamestart.description: You were a scientist for USC, specialized in jump drive testing. After an accident with a gateless jumpdrive, you end up in the middle of nowhere, in a galaxy far far away...

gamestart.name: Rebel Cell Leader
gamestart.description: Take command of Rebel operations within an established sector. Expand and grow your cause until you are ready to take the fight to the Empire.

gamestart.name: Battle Over Scarrif
gamestart.description: Take command of the Profundity and the Rebel fleet in order retrieve the death star plans.

gamestart.name: Spice Runner
gamestart.description: With nothing but a freighter, you must deliver your valuable cargo to your associates in the Corporate Sector.

gamestart.name: Umbaran Refugee
gamestart.description: Having escaped the clutches of the Republic, you return in hopes of liberating your home from the Empire.

gamestart.name: Mandalorian Attache
gamestart.description: You are an official Attache operating under the Mandalorian military sent to defend the interests of the Mandalorian Government.

gamestart.name: Exile
gamestart.description: Having been exiled after Order 66, you deem it time to return to the galaxy.

gamestart.name: Iridonia Startup
gamestart.description: With Czerka Interstellar having failed as an enterprise, you seek to claim some of Czerka's lost glory.

gamestart.name: Alaankwa
gamestart.description: You begin entrusted with a Mothership, complete with a complimentary starter economy fleet.
